name: Maple Glazed Delicata Squash, Cashews, Baby Spinach Salad With Creamy Wasabi Dressing.
description: Maple Glazed Delicata Squash, Cashews, Baby Spinach Salad With Creamy Wasabi Dressing.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon low sodium soy sauce or tamari

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add a teaspoon of oil and heat at low-medium. Arrange the delicata squash to fit in the pan. Sprinkle salt and pinch of pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, add a teaspoon of oil and heat at low-medium. Arrange the delicata squash to fit in the pan. Sprinkle salt and pinch of pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and cook for 12-15 minutes. flip them around and cook for another 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and cook for 12-15 minutes. flip them around and cook for another 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 2 teaspoons of maple syrup and low sodium soy sauce or tamari or to taste Mix well to coat and let cook for another minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 2 teaspoons of maple syrup and low sodium soy sauce or tamari or to taste Mix well to coat and let cook for another minute.

recipeInstructions.text: You can also roast the squash. Toss it in salt pepper, oil, maple and soy to coat, and roast on parchment for 30-40 minutes until tender and browned on the edges.
recipeInstructions.name: You can also roast the squash. Toss it in salt pepper, oil, maple and soy to coat, and roast on parchment for 30-40 minutes until tender and browned on the edges.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile ready your salad with spinach or other baby greens.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile ready your salad with spinach or other baby greens.

recipeInstructions.text: For the dressing, blend the soaked cashews or almonds with wasabi to taste, salt, pepper and vinegar.
recipeInstructions.name: For the dressing, blend the soaked cashews or almonds with wasabi to taste, salt, pepper and vinegar.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the dressing on the salad. Drop some sizzling squash on top and a good helping of cashews, walnuts or other nuts of choice, raw or roasted.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the dressing on the salad. Drop some sizzling squash on top and a good helping of cashews, walnuts or other nuts of choice, raw or roasted.

keywords: easy meal, squash recipe, weeknight dinner
